sentences.en: a cookery book
sentences.cn: 烹饪书

sentences.en: a cop who doesn't exactly play it by the book
sentences.cn: 一个不完全照章办事的警察

sentences.en: Dr Ryan travelled the world gathering material for his book.
sentences.cn: 瑞安博士周游世界为他的书搜集资料。

sentences.en: Have you booked a holiday this year?
sentences.cn: 你今年有没有预订去度假？

sentences.en: He's just written a book, nicely illustrated and not too technical.
sentences.cn: 他刚写完一本书，插图精美，内容也并不艰涩。

sentences.en: His beautifully illustrated book well attested his love of the university.
sentences.cn: 他那本带有精美插图的书见证了他对大学的热爱。

sentences.en: His last book, "Needful Things", was a retread of tired material.
sentences.cn: 他的上一本书《必需品》尽在重复些老掉牙的内容。

sentences.en: I just had a quick scan through your book again.
sentences.cn: 我只是又快速浏览了一遍你的书。

sentences.en: I know my child like a book.
sentences.cn: 我完全了解我的孩子

sentences.en: I’ve just started reading a book by Graham Greene.
sentences.cn: 我刚开始看格雷厄姆·格林写的一本书。

sentences.en: In my book they both are wrong.
sentences.cn: 在我看来他们俩都错了

sentences.en: In this new book, Harrison brilliantly disentangles complex debates.
sentences.cn: 在这本新作中，哈里森巧妙地理顺了那些纷繁复杂的争论。

sentences.en: It didn't suit her book at all to be moved.
sentences.cn: 为其感动根本不合她的心意。

sentences.en: It remained an exceptionally rare book until it was reprinted in 1918.
sentences.cn: 在1918年再版之前，这本书一直非常罕见。

sentences.en: She's indexed the book by author, by age, and by illustrator.
sentences.cn: 她根据作者、年龄和插图画家分别为该书编了索引。

sentences.en: That counts as a lie in my book.
sentences.cn: 在我看来，那就是说谎。

sentences.en: The book follows four characters, loosely based on my uncles.
sentences.cn: 该书描述了4个角色，大致上以我的几个叔叔为原型。

sentences.en: The book is not as morbid as it sounds.
sentences.cn: 这本书并不像听起来那么可怕。

sentences.en: The book is well written, properly illustrated and excellently captioned.
sentences.cn: 这本书写得很好，插图生动形象，说明文字简练精辟。

sentences.en: The flight was already fully booked (=  no more seats were available  ) .
sentences.cn: 这个航班已经订满了。

sentences.en: The guide book contains a short write-up of each hotel.
sentences.cn: 指南上有对每个饭店的简评。

sentences.en: The idea for this book grew out of conversations with Philippa Brewster.
sentences.cn: 创作这本书的想法来源于跟菲莉帕·布鲁斯特的谈话。

sentences.en: The publisher expected the book to sell 1,500 copies, tops.
sentences.cn: 出版商预计该书至多能卖出1,500本。

sentences.en: The show’s booked solid (=  all the tickets have been sold  ) until February.
sentences.cn: 这个演出2月份之前的票已全部售罄。

sentences.en: The tone of the book is sometimes too flip.
sentences.cn: 这本书的笔调有些时候太不严肃了。

sentences.en: To get tickets, you have to book in advance .
sentences.cn: 你必须提前订购才能买到票。

words.tran_cn: 书本上的；好读书的；书呆子气的
（旅馆车票，戏票等的）登记人；寻选模特儿的人

phrases.tran_cn: 申斥；要求…做出解释，要求…说明原委
要求作出解释；要求作出说明
（为结账等目的）停止入账，停止记账
按我一己之见，按我个人的看法
得（失）某人的好感，得（失）宠于某人
◎[美国英语]记录在案的；为人所知的，所熟悉的，所通晓的
（在赛马等中）接受不同数目的赌注；下赌注
（指雇员、顾客等）纪录在案的，已登记入册的
(英)投某人所好，符合某人的要求

phrases.phrase: take a leaf out of someone's book
you can't judge a book by its cover
phrases.tran_cn: (谚)人不可貌相；海水不可斗量

trans.tran_cn: 书，著作，本子，成册的东西，账簿，名册，（长作品的）篇/卷/部
trans.tran_en: a set of printed pages that are held together in a cover so that you can read them
a set of printed pages that are held together in a cover so that you can read them

trans.tran_cn: 预订，预约，立案控告，记名警告
trans.tran_en: to make arrangements to stay in a place, eat in a restaurant, go to a theatre etc at a particular time in the future
to make arrangements to stay in a place, eat in a restaurant, go to a theatre etc at a particular time in the future
